# Copy or move child campaigns

Guides you through the process of copying or moving child campaigns within your Zuora tenant.

Take the following steps to copy or move a child campaign:

1.  Launch Promotion Codes from your Zuora tenant.
2.  In the Campaigns tab, locate the campaign that includes the source child campaign, and click ![check icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/0eaf7384-7420-48e7-9f41-71bb82dfb981?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..H6LpMPVv9jntac7eFVLRwjeML1ivrKG5ZQRwDdpHbk8) to enter the homepage of the campaign.
3.  Scroll to the bottom of the campaign homepage, select the child campaign that you want to copy or move, and click ![Copy move icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/55ec4d3f-4051-4658-8b04-15fea3586414?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Cm2QQBtADveihCcE6-qOV2Kai62Yv08NZX3Z8bsPRtE) . Note that you can select multiple campaigns at one time.
4.  In the dropdown list, select Copy/Move . The Move / Copy Code Group dialog is then displayed.
5.  In the first dropdown list of the dialog, select Copy or Move .
6.  In the section dropdown list, select the target campaign that you want to copy or move the selected child campaigns to.
7.  Click Done .

You can find that the selected child campaigns are displayed on the homepage of the target campaign with identical configuration.
